mapper.select: select id, picture_group as pictureGroupId, picture_format, filepath, sequence, create_time, update_time from picture where id = #{id}
select filepath from picture where id = #{pictureId} and picture_group = #{pictureGroupId}
mapper.insert: insert into picture(picture_group, picture_format, filepath, sequence) values(#{pictureGroupId}, #{pictureFormat}, #{filepath}, #{sequence})
mapper.delete: delete from picture where picture_group = #{pictureGroupId} and id = #{pictureId}
